Detailed Description

String module Module that handles strings

orxSTATIC orxINLINE orxS32 orxString_Compare ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zString1,
orxCONST orxSTRING  _zString2 
)

Compare two strings. If the first one is smaller than the second, it returns -1, If the second one is bigger than the first, and 0 if they are equals

Parameters:
_zString1 (IN) First String to compare
_zString2 (IN) Second string to compare
Returns:
-1, 0 or 1 as indicated in the description.

orxSTATIC orxINLINE orxS32 orxString_NCompare ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zString1,
orxCONST orxSTRING  _zString2,
orxU32  _u32NbChar 
)

Compare N first character from two strings. If the first one is smaller than the second, it returns -1, If the second one is bigger than the first, and 0 if they are equals.

Parameters:
_zString1 (IN) First String to compare
_zString2 (IN) Second string to compare
_u32NbChar (IN) Number of character to compare
Returns:
-1, 0 or 1 as indicated in the description.

orxSTATIC orxINLINE orxSTRING orxString_SearchChar ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zString,
orxCHAR  _cChar 
)

Returns the first occurence of _cChar in _zString

Parameters:
[in] _zString String to analyze
[in] _cChar The character to find
Returns:
The pointer of the first occurence of _cChar, or orxNULL if not found

orxSTATIC orxINLINE orxS32 orxString_SearchCharIndex ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zString,
orxCHAR  _cChar,
orxU32  _u32Position 
)

Returns the first occurence of _cChar in _zString

Parameters:
[in] _zString String to analyze
[in] _cChar The character to find
[in] _u32Position Search begin position
Returns:
The index of the next occurence of requested character, starting at given position / -1 if not found

[in] _zString2 String that must be inside _zString1

orxBOOL *  _pbOutValue,
orxSTRING *  _pzRemaining 
)

Convert a string to a boolean

Parameters:
[in] _zString String To convert
[out] _pbOutValue Converted value
[out] _pzRemaining If non null, will contain the remaining string after the number conversion
Returns:
orxSTATUS_SUCCESS / orxSTATUS_FAILURE

orxS32 *  _ps32OutValue,
orxSTRING *  _pzRemaining 
)

Converts a String to a signed int value, guessing the base

[out] _ps32OutValue Converted value
[out] _pzRemaining If non null, will contain the remaining string after the number conversion

orxSTATIC orxINLINE orxSTATUS orxString_ToS32Base ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zString,
orxU32  _u32Base,
orxS32 *  _ps32OutValue,
orxSTRING *  _pzRemaining 
)

Converts a String to a signed int value using the given base

Parameters:
[in] _zString String To convert
[in] _u32Base Base of the read value (generally 10, but can be 16 to read hexa)
[out] _ps32OutValue Converted value
[out] _pzRemaining If non null, will contain the remaining string after the number conversion
Returns:
orxSTATUS_SUCCESS / orxSTATUS_FAILURE
